name: Idle Gym Life 3D
description:
The normal gym is too boring?
Taking too long to get results?
Lack of challenges that leave you unmotivated?
Do you think going to the gym means lifting weights?

Welcome to IDLE GYM LIFE 3D, This is the place that will turn you from a clumsy guy to a guy with a perfect body and sharp muscles displayed. With the experience of a coaching master, we do not force you to lose weight in an extreme way, but the process of fat loss will come gradually through practical and funny exercises. That's only partly true for us, at IDLE GYM LIFE 3D you'll have to face odd challenges like having to lift delicious chicken thighs , very heavy study desks and dumbbells at... the most terrible.
Your strength is not only shown through the calf or biceps muscles, but also tested through punching exercises, hammering and fighting with gangsters. ﻿Join the world of IDLE GYM LIFE 3D with funny graphics to reduce fat and increase muscle mass to the maximum and conquer challenges right away!
